climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Experience Extra Softness - Our pre-washed microfiber comforter set offers a cotton-like feel that's not only incredibly soft but also colorfast & resistant to wrinkles, ensuring the ultimate comfort for a restful night's sleep

Modern Farmhouse Comforter - Queen size bed comforter displays a charming farmhouse design with a modern twist. The elegant pintuck pleated accent creates an inviting atmosphere in any bedroom, a perfect blend of rustic charm and contemporary allure

All Season Bedding - This versatile comforter is designed to keep you cozy and comfortable in any season. Lightweight & breathable to keep you cool during summer nights, yet with ample warmth to provide comfort through colder winter seasons

Farmhouse Comforter Set - 1 Full/Queen Comforter: 90"W X 90"L, 2 Standard Shams: 20"W X 26"L+2"D. This bedding set is skin friendly and Oeko-Tex certified for superior comfort and wellness, free from compromising substances or chemicals

Easy Care - Machine washable. Use large capacity washer and dryer for best results. Cold/delicate cycle, low/no heat dry. Comes in compressed packaging, fluff up items as needed. Use fabric steamer for wrinkles
body.description: Our pre-washed microfiber bedding set offers the luxurious feel of cotton, yet with added benefits. It's incredibly soft, colorfast, and wrinkle-resistant, ensuring you enjoy the ultimate in comfort for a blissful night's sleep. It showcases a charming farmhouse design with a modern twist. The elegant pintuck pleated accent creates an inviting atmosphere, perfectly blending rustic charm with contemporary allure. It is machine washable, making it easy to maintain and ensuring that your sleep sanctuary is always fresh and inviting

reviews.reviewerName: Very nice, as described and fast shipping.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this comforter. Very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Snuggly, clean look
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I don't like about this comforter is that it seems slightly small. I have a king bed and the comforter just isn't quite as big as most king sized comforters. That said, it is lightweight and snuggly. It also looks great. It it like a home magazine, so inviting, homey, and airy looking. It fits the farmhouse vibe, but it also fits other styles just as well. It also washes really nicely- no bunching up or pilling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, love it, love it. It’s exactly what I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This comforter is perfect for our bedroom! It is the perfect color and goes with our farmhouse decor! Keeps us warm without being too heavy and hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cozy dreams await
reviews.reviewText: the comfort spaces white king comforter set is pretty chill. it's easy to clean, just toss it in the washer. the versatility is there with its all-season design, but it could use more patterns. pre-washed microfiber gives it a cotton-like feel, adding to the coziness. it's easy to use, just spread it on your bed for instant farmhouse vibes. while not perfect, it's a solid 3.5-star pick for its chill vibes, easy cleaning, and overall snugness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Comfort and Farmhouse Elegance!
reviews.reviewText: The Comfort Spaces Cream Queen Comforter Set has transformed my bedroom into a luxurious haven of comfort and farmhouse elegance. The pintuck pleated design adds a touch of sophistication, giving the bedding a timeless and classic look.The lightweight, all-season comforter provides the perfect balance of warmth without feeling too heavy. The pre-washed microfiber material feels incredibly soft and comfortable against the skin. The set includes shams that complete the overall aesthetic, creating a cohesive and inviting atmosphere.I am genuinely impressed with the quality and attention to detail in this bedding set. It's not just a comforter; it's a statement piece that has elevated the style and comfort of my bedroom. Highly recommend to anyone seeking a blend of luxury and farmhouse charm in their bedding!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend
reviews.reviewText: Terrible. Will be returning. There's minimal stuffing inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm, gender neutral comforter
reviews.reviewText: I chose this comforter because it was a great value for a guest bedroom.What I liked:The comforter is on a full bed and drops all the way to the floor on both sides and provides plenty of length for my 6'2" son.The fabric is soft and cozy, but the geometric texture fits the rest of the room.Shams are included.The comforter shipped compressed and had thorough directions for returning the piece to full volume with no wrinkles.It went through my front load washer with no problems or loss of softness (microfiber stayed soft with no pilling, filling didn't separate or bunch.)Comfortably warm in a cool room, but thin enough not to be suffocating.What I didn't like:The comforter can only be oriented one way because of the pintuck design.The quilting isn't incorporated into the pintuck design.Every little speck or stain shows on this fabric.Overall, I felt this was a great quality for the price point. The comforter is lightweight and warm for sleeping. I don't know how well it would fit on a King sized bed, but it has a perfect drop on a full bed.
